did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Personal and professional papers of Jack Lewis relating to his career as a chaplain and minister; the Christian Faith and Life Community; Cornell United Religious Work (CURW) and many community based social support programs.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Personal and professional papers of Jack Lewis relating to his career as a chaplain and minister; the Christian Faith and Life Community; Cornell United Religious Work (CURW) and many community based social support programs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Jack Lewis Collection, #6508. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

emph.ref: Series I. Christian Faith and Life Community (CFLC) files
Series II. Cornell United Religious Works (CURW)

p.ref: Speaking Engagements, Workshops, and Conference Files

emph.ref: Series III. Work and Study Resource Files
Series V. Workshops, Lectures, and Sermons
